clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 20 mm in diameter.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in hilum.
Small pneumothorax on the hilum side.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in hilum.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
